name: http://linksys.com/jnap/notification/Notification
desc: This service provides a mechanism to provision network notifications.

GetDeviceNotificationSettings.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/notification/GetDeviceNotificationSettings
GetDeviceNotificationSettings.desc: This service provides a mechanism to provision network notifications. This action returns the router's device notification state.

isDeviceNotificationEnabled.desc: Whether device notification is currently enabled.

deviceIDs.desc: A list of device IDs for which notifications are enabled. If not present, notifications will apply to all devices.

SetDeviceNotificationSettings.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/notification/SetDeviceNotificationSettings
SetDeviceNotificationSettings.desc: This action allows the enabling/disabling of device connection notifications.

isDeviceNotificationEnabled.desc: Whether device notification should be enabled.

deviceIDs.desc: A list of device IDs for which notifications are enabled. If not present, notifications will apply to all devices.

errors.ErrorUnknownDevice: The device does not match any known device.
